meta.title: Poray Electrics – Electric vehicles
meta.description: Poray Electrics designs and builds modern electric vehicles – scooters, cross bikes and cargo vehicles for businesses.

vehicles.heading: Poray Electrics Vehicles
vehicles.lead: Different platforms, one shared goal — fun, safety, performance and longevity.

voyager.lead: Lightweight electric cross bike for sport riding. High power in a compact package for riders entering the e-offroad world.
features: 12 kW you can genuinely feel off-road
Geometry designed for riding beyond asphalt
Suspension tuned to the rider — not the other way around

intruder.lead: Intruder is built for the most demanding users. Higher power and premium components ensure performance and long-term durability.

voyager.lead: A lighter configuration on the same platform — 12 kW of power for sport riding and fast off-road escapes.

tech.heading: Technology under control
tech.lead: We develop our own solutions — from wiring design to controller tuning and BMS configuration.
tech.title: Battery packs engineered for real-world use.
tech.text: Cell selection, pack architecture and safety systems are always tailored to the application — without compromises between range and safety.
bullets: Cell balancing, data logging and thermal protection
Possibility of building a package for integration with the customer's existing vehicle electronics

cards.bmsText: Monitoring of every cell group, remote diagnostics and service logs.
cards.integrationText: Controllers tuned for specific motors and vehicle use cases.
cards.testingText: Prototype builds, measurements, refinements and production readiness.

about.heading: About Poray Electrics
about.lead: For six years, we have combined engineering expertise with hands-on experience in building electric vehicles. Our primary focus is the development of new vehicles from our own lineup, while we also provide modification, servicing, and electric conversion work.
about.title: From prototypes to finished vehicles
about.text: Our focus is to build vehicles that are:
bullets: Reliability — solutions designed for long-term, trouble-free operation.
Attention to detail — even where it is not visually apparent, but critical to durability and safety.
Designed for real-world conditions — construction tailored to the environment and loads the vehicle is actually expected to face.

stats.projectsValue: Our experience comes from hands-on work with electric vehicles — testing, modifications, and riding in the conditions these machines are actually built for. This allows us to distinguish between solutions that truly work and those that only look good on a specification sheet.
